bookmarks.name: Grand Canyon
bookmarks.description: The Grand Canyon is a steep-sided canyon carved by the Colorado River in Arizona, United States. The Grand Canyon is 277 miles (446 km) long, up to 18 miles (29 km) wide and attains a depth of over a mile (6,093 feet or 1,857 meters).

bookmarks.name: Taj Mahal
bookmarks.description: An immense mausoleum of white marble, built in Agra between 1631 and 1648 by order of the Mughal emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his favourite wife, the Taj Mahal is the jewel of Muslim art in India and one of the universally admired masterpieces of the world's heritage.

bookmarks.name: Great Wall of China
bookmarks.description: The Great Wall of China is a series of fortifications that were built across the historical northern borders of ancient Chinese states and Imperial China as protection against various nomadic groups from the Eurasian Steppe.

bookmarks.name: BR Ambedkar Statue
bookmarks.description: BR Ambedkar Statue, BR Ambedkar Road, Ulvapadu - 523292, Andhra Pradesh, India

places.name: Taj Mahal
places.description: An immense mausoleum of white marble, built in Agra between 1631 and 1648 by order of the Mughal emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his favourite wife, the Taj Mahal is the jewel of Muslim art in India and one of the universally admired masterpieces of the world's heritage.

places.name: Eiffel Tower
places.description: The Eiffel Tower is a wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France. It is named after the engineer Gustave Eiffel, whose company designed and built the tower.

places.name: Great Wall of China
places.description: The Great Wall of China is a series of fortifications that were built across the historical northern borders of ancient Chinese states and Imperial China as protection against various nomadic groups from the Eurasian Steppe.

places.name: Machu Picchu
places.description: Machu Picchu is a 15th-century Inca citadel, located in the Eastern Cordillera of southern Peru, on a 2,430-metre (7,970 ft) mountain ridge.

places.name: Grand Canyon
places.description: The Grand Canyon is a steep-sided canyon carved by the Colorado River in Arizona, United States. The Grand Canyon is 277 miles (446 km) long, up to 18 miles (29 km) wide and attains a depth of over a mile (6,093 feet or 1,857 meters).

places.name: Santorini
places.description: Santorini is one of the Cyclades islands in the Aegean Sea. It was devastated by a volcanic eruption in the 16th century BC, forever shaping its rugged landscape.

places.name: Kyoto
places.description: Kyoto, once the capital of Japan, is a city on the island of Honshu. It's famous for its numerous classical Buddhist temples, as well as gardens, imperial palaces, Shinto shrines and traditional wooden houses.

places.name: Rio de Janeiro
places.description: Rio de Janeiro is a huge seaside city in Brazil, famous for its Copacabana and Ipanema beaches, 38m Christ the Redeemer statue atop Mount Corcovado and for Sugarloaf Mountain, a granite peak with cable cars to its summit.

places.name: Cape Town
places.description: Cape Town is a port city on South Africa’s southwest coast, on a peninsula beneath the imposing Table Mountain. Slowly rotating cable cars climb to the mountain’s flat top, from which there are sweeping views of the city.

places.name: New York City
places.description: New York City comprises 5 boroughs sitting where the Hudson River meets the Atlantic Ocean. At its core is Manhattan, a densely populated borough that’s among the world’s major commercial, financial and cultural centers.

places.name: Burj Khalifa
places.description: The Burj Khalifa is the tallest building in the world, offering breathtaking panoramic views of Dubai from its observation decks.

places.name: Colosseum
places.description: The Colosseum is an ancient amphitheater and one of Rome’s most iconic architectural marvels, symbolizing the might of the Roman Empire.

places.name: Sydney Opera House
places.description: The Sydney Opera House is a multi-venue performing arts center and an iconic landmark known for its unique architectural design.

places.name: Niagara Falls
places.description: Niagara Falls is a group of three waterfalls located on the border of Ontario and New York, famous for their massive flow and scenic views.

places.name: Mount Fuji
places.description: Mount Fuji is the highest mountain in Japan and a beloved cultural symbol, drawing climbers and artists alike.

places.name: Statue of Liberty
places.description: The Statue of Liberty is a colossal neoclassical sculpture on Liberty Island, symbolizing freedom and democracy.

places.name: Banff National Park
places.description: Banff National Park is a world-famous destination known for its pristine lakes, mountains, and wildlife.

places.name: Times Square
places.description: Times Square is a vibrant commercial and entertainment hub known for its bright lights and Broadway theaters.

places.name: Petra
places.description: Petra is an archaeological city famous for its rock-cut architecture and water conduit system.

places.name: Ha Long Bay
places.description: Ha Long Bay is known for emerald waters and thousands of towering limestone islands topped with rainforests.

places.name: Angkor Wat
places.description: Angkor Wat is the largest religious monument in the world and a stunning example of Khmer architecture.

places.name: Istanbul Hagia Sophia
places.description: Hagia Sophia is an architectural marvel and UNESCO World Heritage site with rich religious and cultural history.

places.name: Bora Bora
places.description: Bora Bora is known for its turquoise waters, luxurious resorts, and volcanic mountains.

places.name: London Big Ben
places.description: Big Ben is a famous clock tower located at the north end of the Palace of Westminster in London.

places.name: Pyramids of Giza
places.description: The Pyramids of Giza are monumental tombs from ancient Egypt, including the Great Pyramid—one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

places.name: Maldives
places.description: The Maldives is a tropical paradise known for white-sand beaches, coral reefs, and overwater villas.

places.name: Mount Everest
places.description: Mount Everest is the highest mountain on Earth, attracting climbers from around the world.

places.name: Disneyland
places.description: Disneyland is a world-famous theme park known for magical attractions and entertainment for all ages.

places.name: Christ the Redeemer
places.description: Christ the Redeemer is a monumental statue and one of the New Seven Wonders of the World.

places.name: Yellowstone National Park
places.description: Yellowstone is the first U.S. national park, famous for geysers, hot springs, and rich wildlife.

hotels.name: Casa del Sol
hotels.address: Av. Imperio de los Incas, Aguas Calientes

itinerary.title: Arrival & Tour
itinerary.description: Pick up from Delhi, drive to Agra. Visit Taj Mahal and Agra Fort. Lunch at 5-star hotel. Return to Delhi.

itinerary.title: Delhi Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Qutub Minar, Lotus Temple, and India Gate.

itinerary.title: Delhi to Agra
itinerary.description: Drive to Agra. Visit Taj Mahal at sunset.

itinerary.title: Agra to Jaipur
itinerary.description: Visit Fatehpur Sikri en route to Jaipur.

itinerary.title: Jaipur Tour
itinerary.description: Amber Fort, City Palace, and Hawa Mahal.

itinerary.title: Return to Delhi
itinerary.description: Shopping in Jaipur and drive back to Delhi.

itinerary.title: Walking Tour
itinerary.description: Explore the hidden lanes of Agra, taste local street food, and visit ancient mosques.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Cruise
itinerary.description: Arrival in Paris. Evening Seine River Dinner Cruise.

itinerary.title: Eiffel & Montmartre
itinerary.description: Skip-the-line Eiffel Tower access. Afternoon walking tour of Montmartre.

itinerary.title: Wine & Departure
itinerary.description: Wine tasting session in Le Marais. Departure.

itinerary.title: Louvre Museum
itinerary.description: Guided tour of the Louvre Museum. See the Mona Lisa.

itinerary.title: City Tour
itinerary.description: Hop-on Hop-off bus tour of Paris major attractions.

itinerary.title: Cruise
itinerary.description: 1-hour sightseeing cruise on the Seine with audio guide.

itinerary.title: Hiking Adventure
itinerary.description: Hike from Jinshanling to Simatai West. Authentic Great Wall experience.

itinerary.title: Arrival
itinerary.description: Airport pickup and transfer to hotel.

itinerary.title: City Highlights
itinerary.description: Tiananmen Square, Forbidden City, and Temple of Heaven.

itinerary.title: Great Wall
itinerary.description: Mutianyu Great Wall tour with cable car.

itinerary.title: Summer Palace
itinerary.description: Visit Summer Palace and departure.

itinerary.title: Mutianyu Tour
itinerary.description: Visit Mutianyu section. Take cable car up and toboggan down.

itinerary.title: Cusco to Wayllabamba
itinerary.description: Start trekking from Km 82.

itinerary.title: Dead Woman's Pass
itinerary.description: Challenging hike to the highest point.

itinerary.title: Cloud Forest
itinerary.description: Trek through cloud forests and Inca sites.

itinerary.title: Machu Picchu
itinerary.description: Arrive at Sun Gate for sunrise over Machu Picchu.

itinerary.title: Cusco City
itinerary.description: Tour of Cusco cathedral and nearby ruins.

itinerary.title: Sacred Valley
itinerary.description: Visit Pisac market and Ollantaytambo fortress.

itinerary.title: Machu Picchu
itinerary.description: Train to Aguas Calientes and Machu Picchu tour.

itinerary.title: Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: Early train from Cusco, bus to ruins, guided tour, return train.

itinerary.title: Flight
itinerary.description: 45-minute helicopter flight over the widest and deepest parts of the canyon.

itinerary.title: Descent
itinerary.description: Hike down North Kaibab trail to Phantom Ranch.

itinerary.title: Ascent
itinerary.description: Hike up Bright Angel trail to South Rim.

itinerary.title: Sunset Tour
itinerary.description: Visit Mohave Point and Hopi Point for sunset views.

itinerary.title: Cruise
itinerary.description: Sail past the volcano and hot springs. BBQ dinner on board. Watch sunset from Oia.

itinerary.title: Temples & Shrines
itinerary.description: Visit Golden Pavilion, Nijo Castle, and Fushimi Inari Shrine.

itinerary.title: Sambadrome
itinerary.description: Watch the champion's parade at the Sambadrome with VIP box seats.

itinerary.title: Flexible
itinerary.description: Visit 5 top attractions including Empire State Building, AMNH, and Statue of Liberty.

itinerary.title: Ancient Rome
itinerary.description: Colosseum and Forum tour.

itinerary.title: City Tour
itinerary.description: Sydney sights.

itinerary.title: Falls
itinerary.description: Maid of the Mist boat tour.

itinerary.title: Climb
itinerary.description: Hike to 8th station.

itinerary.title: Liberty
itinerary.description: Ferry to Liberty Island.

itinerary.title: Lakes
itinerary.description: Visit famous lakes.

itinerary.title: Cruise
itinerary.description: Board junk boat.
